detail_desc: Short-sleeved top in ribbed organic cotton jersey with an overlocked edge at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and wide, straight legs.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the waist and a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Sandals in soft leather with adjustable straps, moulded insoles and patterned soles.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in softly draping mulberry silk with elastication at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with slits and a decorative bow at the cuffs.
Short-sleeved blouse in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and rounded hem.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Detachable, lined hood, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets, and soft fleece inner ribbing and a tab with an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Short dress in sturdy jersey with a round neck, short, flounced sleeves, a seam at the waist and tie belt that wraps over at the back. Gently flared skirt with concealed pockets in the side seams and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.

Boxy, padded jacket in nylon with a shimmering metallic finish. High, padded collar with press-studs at the front, a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and flap front pockets with concealed press-studs. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs, and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Soft, mesh-lined bra top in microfibre with an elasticated hem.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in velvet with a lace-trimmed V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a seam at the waist. Side pockets, wide elastication at the back and tapered legs. Partly lined.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit wool blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Plastic box in the shape of a flower containing beads in various designs including letter beads, and elastic thread in six different colours.
Maxi skirt woven in a cotton blend with covered elastication at the waist and gathered tiers to create width and volume. Unlined.
Metal chain necklaces in various designs, two with a pendant. Length 56 cm, 61 cm and 70 cm.
Jumper in a textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and close-fitting cuffs.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck opening at the front and a yoke with gathers at the back and on the shoulders. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Short, boxy top in sweatshirt fabric with a flock print. Slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Leggings in a soft, rib-knit organic cotton blend with covered elastication at the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Hooded jumper in a soft, fine knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and high slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Beret in fine-knit wool containing some nylon.
Ankle-length dress in woven fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck and wrapover top. Seam under the bust, a concealed zip in one side and a softly draping, pleated skirt. Lined.

Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a print pattern on the front and taped details. Twisted side seams, mesh back, rounded hem and reflective details. Slightly longer at the back.
High-waisted shorts in washed, stretch denim. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, back pockets and sewn-in rolled-up edges at the hems.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Soft faux fur linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Jumper in a soft knit with a motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Lined.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

Biker treggings in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and decorative seams at the knees. Wide jersey waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Warm-lined Chelsea boots in imitation suede with a decorative scalloped edge, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Boxy coat in soft, felted fabric containing some wool with notch lapels and buttons at the front. Flap welt front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. The polyester content of the coat is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
Joggers in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in a soft, fine, fluffy knit. Deep V-neck, pearly buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with frilled shoulder straps and a wrapover top with an open section at the front. Concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined at the top.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim in a slightly looser fit with a high waist, button fly and straight legs.
Long earrings in metal and plastic with fabric tassels. Length 16 cm.
Knee-length shorts in waffled cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Regular fit.

department_name: Underwear Jersey Fancy inactive from s1
detail_desc: Jersey T-shirt in soft jersey made from pima cotton.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Double-layered tube scarf in soft cotton jersey.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a pile-lined, rib-trimmed drawstring hood. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a textured, premium cotton knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck T-shirt in cotton jersey with raw edges.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with billowing tulle flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Imitation leather trainers with a lightly padded top edge, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front and contrasting colour heel caps. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Wide T-shirt in cotton jersey with wide sleeves in a cotton weave. The sleeves have an elasticated seam and slit underneath.
Boxy-style, cropped top in soft cotton jersey. Round neckline with a jacquard-knit trim, dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
Joggers in soft organic cotton jersey with a frill-trimmed, elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved top in linen jersey with a V-neck.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué on the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with a high waist, gently flared legs and raw edges.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved T-shirt dress in soft, coated jersey. Unlined.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with a deep neckline and 3/4-length sleeves.
Shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a straight hem with slits in the sides.

Lightly padded parka in woven fabric. Detachable hood with a faux shearling lining and faux fur trim and a zip down the front with a chin guard and wind flap. Chest pockets with a concealed zip and patch front pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastening. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Soft faux shearling lining. The polyester content of the parka is partly recycled.
Relaxed-fit blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with reflective details. Lined, drawstring hood with a detachable faux fur trim and adjustable hook and loop tab at the back, and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Fleece-lined handwarmer pockets, flap patch pockets with a hook and loop fastening and one inner pocket. Inner ribbing and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Lined. Polyester filling.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Patterned scarf in a silk and Tencel™ lyocell weave.
Brazilian briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Long, round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey with a curved hem.
V-neck T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and lace-trimmed hems.
Wrapover jersey top with a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and long sleeves.
Sports top in sturdy jersey with a mesh-lined hood with a collar and elasticated drawstring. Discreet kangaroo pocket and long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen and a s split shoulder strap on one shoulder.
Wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and press-studs at one side and at the crotch.
